Module ParenteVenturini

Package it.polimi.ingsw.ParenteVenturini.Model.Cards

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApolloCard
    ApolloCard Power - Your Move: Your Worker may move into an opponent Worker's space by forcing their Worker to the space yours just vacated.
    ArtemisCard
    ArtemisCard Power - Your Move: Your Worker may move one additional time, but not back to its initial space.
    AthenaCard
    AthenaCard Power - Opponent's Turn: If one of your Workers moved up on your last turn, opponent Workers cannot move up this turn.
    AtlasCard
    AtlasCard Power - Your Build: Your Worker may build a dome at any level.
    Card
    this class represent the cards, it returns Move class, WinCheck class and OpponentEffect class based on the specific card
    ChronusCard
    ChronusCard Power - Win Condition: You also win when there are at least five Complete Towers on the board.
    Deck
    this class contains all the possible cards
    DemeterCard
    DemeterCard Power - Your Build: Your Worker may build one additional time, but not on the same space.
    HephaestusCard
    HephaestusCard Power - Your Build: Your Worker may build one additional block (not dome) on top of your first block.
    HeraCard
    HeraCard Power - Opponent's Turn: An opponent cannot win by moving into a perimeter space.
    HestiaCard
    HestiaCard Power - Your Build: Your Worker may build one additional time, but this cannot be on a perimeter space.
    MinotaurCard
    MinotaurCard Power - Your Move: Your Worker may move into an opponent Worker's space, if their Worker can be forced one space straight backwards to an unoccupied space at any level.
    PanCard
    PanCard Power - Win Condition: You also win if your Worker moves down two or more levels.
    PrometheusCard
    PrometheusCard Power - Your Turn: If your Worker does not move up, it may build both before and after moving.
    TritonCard
    TritonCard Power - Your Move: Each time your Worker moves into a perimeter space, it may immediately move again.
    ZeusCard
    ZeusCard Power - Your Build: Your Worker may build a block under itself.
